high_descs: Turn to the right and then right again before turning right to face the pillow on the bed.
Pick the pillow up from the bed.
Turn to the left and face the dresser with the lamp on it.
anns.task_desc: Turn on a lamp while holding a pillow.

high_descs: Turn right, walk to the desk, then turn right and walk forward to the bed.
Pick up the pillow on the bed which is to the right of the laptop.
Turn left and stand in front of the lamp on the dresser.
anns.task_desc: Examine a pillow by the light of a lamp on a dresser.

high_descs: Turn right then walk towards the dresser, turn right then walk towards the bed.
Pick up the pillow to the right of the laptop on the bed.
Turn around then face the dresser.
anns.task_desc: Pick up a pillow and turn the lamp on.
